title: 垃圾K11叫自己office員工免費做埋看更

replies.msg:
"Dear all, given the recent protests which might impact our mall operations, we need extra helpers from different departments to help handling emergency situations, if any, to take videos / pictures or liaise with tenants in delivering urgent messages.

Saturday Shift - 11 helpers / per shift
1. 10am to 4pm
2. 4pm to 10pm

Sunday Shift - 11 helpers / per shift
1. 10am to 4pm
2. 4pm to 10pm

As a team, please ask your staff to be our extra helpers in Art Mall and MUSEA during this difficult time. Charlotte will follow up with you to get the names from your department.

Many thanks for your assistance and cooperation in advance."

靜靜雞推，其實老板們好驚d示威者走入新商場所以先要咁多員工睇住（佢哋係便服，正常人係唔會知）仲要尖沙嘴嘅大地主一早寫左信比警察話一定唔可以放催淚彈，會嚇走有錢嘅客，所以其實尖東海旁一帶係幾大嘅春袋 (尤其是K11 musea 呢個新商場）
